info.title: Automatic Schedule Generation and Schedule Management API
info.description: API for automatic schedule generation and schedule management within scheduled areas. Supports generation by groups, people, and teams with various distribution rules and period configurations.

post.description: Generates a preview of schedules that will be created based on the provided configuration. This endpoint does not create schedules, only returns a preview for validation.
Confirms the generation configuration and creates all schedules. This endpoint creates a schedule generation record and multiple schedule records based on the configuration.

404.description: Scheduled area, groups, teams, or persons not found

409.description: Conflict - Cannot create generation due to conflicts (e.g., existing schedules in the period, groups/persons being used in other schedules)

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all schedule generations for a scheduled area.

200.description: List of schedule generations retrieved successfully

get.description: Retrieves a specific schedule generation with all its associated schedules.

404.description: Schedule generation or scheduled area not found

delete.summary: Delete schedule generation and all its schedules
delete.description: Deletes a schedule generation and all schedules associated with it. This action cannot be undone.

204.description: Schedule generation and all schedules deleted successfully

404.description: Schedule generation or scheduled area not found

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of schedules for a scheduled area. Supports filtering by schedule generation, date range, person, group, team, and status.

parameters.name: personId
parameters.description: Filter by person ID (schedules where this person participates)

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Filter by group ID (schedules with this group)

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: Filter by team ID (schedules with this team)

post.description: Creates a manual schedule (not generated automatically).

404.description: Scheduled area, groups, teams, or persons not found

get.description: Retrieves a specific schedule with all its details including members, assignments, and comments.

404.description: Schedule or scheduled area not found

patch.description: Updates a schedule. Only manual schedules can be fully updated. Automatically generated schedules can only have their status and members updated.

404.description: Schedule or scheduled area not found

delete.description: Deletes a schedule. Only manual schedules can be deleted. Automatically generated schedules should be deleted through their schedule generation.

404.description: Schedule or scheduled area not found

post.description: Adds a person to a schedule with a specific responsibility.

400.description: Invalid input data or person already in schedule

404.description: Schedule, person, or responsibility not found

patch.description: Updates a schedule member's responsibility or status.

404.description: Schedule member, schedule, or scheduled area not found

delete.description: Removes a person from a schedule.

404.description: Schedule member, schedule, or scheduled area not found

post.description: Adds a comment to a schedule.

404.description: Schedule or scheduled area not found

patch.description: Updates a comment on a schedule. Only the comment author can update their comment.

400.description: Invalid input data or unauthorized to update

404.description: Comment, schedule, or scheduled area not found

delete.description: Deletes a comment from a schedule. Only the comment author or administrators can delete comments.

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to delete this comment

404.description: Comment, schedule, or scheduled area not found

scheduledAreaId.description: Scheduled area where schedules will be generated

generationType.description: Type of generation: 'group' (by groups), 'people' (by people), 'team_without_restriction' (team without responsibility validation), 'team_with_restriction' (team with responsibility validation)

periodType.description: Type of period: 'fixed' (single schedule), 'monthly' (repeats monthly), 'weekly' (repeats weekly), 'daily' (repeats daily with restrictions)

periodStartDate.description: Start date of the generation period

periodEndDate.description: End date of the generation period

groupIds.description: Array of group IDs to use in generation

groupsPerSchedule.description: Number of groups to assign per schedule

distributionOrder.description: Distribution order: 'sequential' (fixed order), 'random' (random order), 'balanced' (balanced distribution avoiding repetitions)

considerAbsences.description: Whether to consider absences when selecting groups (groups with absent members will be excluded)

excludedPersonIds.description: Array of person IDs to exclude from groups (even if they are group members)

considerAbsences.description: Whether to consider absences when selecting people

excludedPersonIds.description: Array of person IDs to exclude (all other people in the area are included by default)

teamId.description: Team ID to use in generation

participantSelection.description: Participant selection mode: 'all' (all people in area), 'by_group' (filter by groups), 'individual' (manual selection), 'all_with_exclusions' (all except excluded)

selectedGroupIds.description: Array of group IDs (required when participantSelection is 'by_group')

selectedPersonIds.description: Array of person IDs (required when participantSelection is 'individual')

excludedPersonIds.description: Array of person IDs to exclude (used when participantSelection is 'all_with_exclusions')

considerAbsences.description: Whether to consider absences when selecting people

requireResponsibilities.description: Whether to require responsibilities (only people with matching responsibilities can be assigned to roles)

repeatPersonsWhenInsufficient.description: When enabled, if there are not enough people to fill all roles, available people will be repeated to fill remaining slots

baseDateTime.description: Base date/time for the first schedule (used for fixed, weekly, monthly, daily)

duration.description: Duration of each schedule in days (for weekly, monthly) or hours (for fixed)

interval.description: Interval between schedules in days (for weekly period type, default: 7)

weekdays.description: Days of the week (0=Sunday, 1=Monday, ..., 6=Saturday) for daily period type

startTime.description: Start time in HH:mm format (for daily period type)

endTime.description: End time in HH:mm format (for daily period type)

excludedDates.description: Array of dates to exclude from generation (useful for holidays)

includedDates.description: Array of specific dates to include even if they don't match the pattern (useful for special days)

schedules.description: Array of preview schedules that will be created

id.description: Temporary ID for preview (not a real schedule ID)

groups.description: Groups assigned to this schedule (for group generation type)

team.description: Team assigned to this schedule (for team generation types)

warnings.description: Array of warning messages (e.g., consecutive repetitions, unbalanced distribution)

errors.description: Array of error messages (e.g., absent people, missing responsibilities, unassigned roles)

members.description: Members of the group (populated when requested)

personId.description: Person ID (empty string if not assigned)

personName.description: Person name ('[No atribudo]' if not assigned)

totalSchedules.description: Total number of schedules that will be created

totalParticipants.description: Total number of unique participants across all schedules

distributionBalance.description: Distribution balance status: 'balanced' (good distribution), 'unbalanced' (some issues), 'critical' (many issues)

configuration.description: Full configuration used for generation (JSON object)

createdBy.description: ID of the person who created the generation

scheduleType.description: Type of schedule: 'group' (assigned to groups), 'team' (assigned to team with roles), 'individual' (assigned to individual people)

groupIds.description: Array of group IDs (required when scheduleType is 'group')

assignments.description: Array of person-role assignments (required when scheduleType is 'team')

memberIds.description: Array of person IDs (required when scheduleType is 'individual')

scheduleGenerationId.description: ID of the schedule generation (null for manual schedules)

participantsCount.description: Number of participants in the schedule

groups.description: Groups assigned to this schedule (when scheduleType is 'group')

team.description: Team assigned to this schedule (when scheduleType is 'team')

members.description: Schedule members (when scheduleType is 'individual' or for group schedules)

quantity.description: Number of people needed for this role

isFree.description: Whether this role is free (can be assigned) or fixed (has fixed persons)
